name: ARCADE
description:
WELCOME TO ARCADE

ARCADE is an ARCADE game in which you shoot 'n' dodge. Are you dead? Press START button and shoot 'n' dodge again! Sounds easy, doesn't it? I would argue with you!

STORY MODE

The “story mode” allows you to complete story of ARCADE or just have fun. Over 30 levels that will not make you bored.

MUSIC LISTENING MODE

You are immortal! No, unfortunately, only in the game, but still immortal! So be it, let us give you the right to enjoy great music without fear of death.

ENDLESS MODE

Fight endless crowds of enemies, train and get frantic pleasure!

Steam Leaderboards

Compete with other players for the right to call themselves a real ARCADE player.
